hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'We have had a ring made with an inscription, and no one else should copy this inscription

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَنَقْشِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Description of the Ring of the Prophet (ﷺ) [ﷺ] and its Inscription
